info.author: Michael Kluge
info.description: gene set enrichment analysis on GO and KEGG
info.paperDescription: Afterwards gene set enrichment analysis was performed on gene sets defined by GO and KEGG enrichment on up-/down-regulated genes.

param.name: backgroundFile
param.description: path to file with header, which contains a list of ENSEMBL or GENDCODE identifiers that should be used as backgroud

param.name: testFiles
param.description: path to file(s) with header, which contain a list of ENSEMBL or GENDCODE identifiers that should be used for enrichment testing

param.name: orgDB
param.description: name of the organism database (orgDB) that should be used as GO annotation; if package is missing it is installed via biocLite

param.name: keggDBName
param.description: organism code for KEGG (e.g. mmu / hsa); http://www.genome.jp/kegg/catalog/org_list.html; if not supported by KEGGREST parameter will be ignored

param.name: plotKegg
param.description: if enabled, plots are created for KEGG pathways

param.name: output
param.description: path to output basename; folder is created if not existent

param.name: suffix
param.description: suffix that is inserted before basename of output; if a absolute path basename is applied

param.name: foldchangeCol
param.description: name of the colum that contains the log2FC
